title: Microsoft Teams is getting support for real-time language interpretation and a speaker coach
content:
Today, Microsoft is announcing a handful of new hybrid work features across Microsoft 365. As you might expect, Microsoft Teams is the biggest focus of the new features, and it’s getting new features including real-time language interpretation, speaker coach, and more.
